home.subtitle: Supporting Mental Health in Morocco
home.description: We are dedicated to promoting mental health awareness and providing support to those in need.

advocacy.title: Advocacy
advocacy.description: Fighting stigma and promoting mental health rights

about.title: About Us
about.description: Discover our mission and the team behind AMUP

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: AMUP is dedicated to promoting mental health awareness, reducing stigma, and supporting individuals and families affected by mental health challenges in Morocco.

history.title: Our History
history.description: Founded in [YEAR], AMUP began as a small group of dedicated individuals committed to improving mental health support in Morocco. Over the years, we have grown into a national organization.
history.impact: Through our various programs and initiatives, we have helped thousands of people access mental health resources and support.

president.name: Dr. Redouan Lotfy
president.title: President's Message
president.greeting: First and foremost, a big thank you to everyone who has visited our website.`

content.part1: Indeed, your interest in mental health is a strong support for us, as we strive first and foremost to combat the stigmatization of mental illness, whose main consequences are discrimination, exclusion and social rejection of people with mental disorders.
content.part2: We emphasize that a person with a mental disorder is perfectly capable of playing a positive and constructive role in society when he or she is understood and supported.
content.part3: Nous à l’association marocaine des usagers de la psychiatrie, nous sommes ouverts à tous et  à toutes les compétences en vue d’une collaboration pour la bonne cause.  Alors agissons ensemble pour une meilleure qualité de vie pour les usagers, leurs familles, leurs proches et amis.
content.part4: This action is imminent, given that the World Health Organization considers that, worldwide, 5 of the most worrying pathologies of the 21st century are related to psychiatry: schizophrenia, bipolar disorders, addictions, depression and obsessive-compulsive disorders.
content.part5: On the other hand, the state would gain a great deal in terms of economic, political and social costs if mental illness were taken care of.
content.part6: So let's work together for the good of patients and their families.

goals.description: Working together for better mental health in Morocco
